body: *DAMAGE EVOLUTION, TYPE=${1}, DEGRADATION=${2}, DEPENDENCIES=${3}, FAILURE INDEX=${4}, MIXED MODE BEHAVIOR=${5}, MODE MIX RATIO=${6}, POWER=${7}, SOFTENING=${8}
DAMAGE EVOLUTION(TYPE, DEGRADATION, DEPE.description: DAMAGE EVOLUTION with parameter(s) TYPE, DEGRADATION, DEPENDENCIES, FAILURE INDEX, MIXED MODE BEHAVIOR, MODE MIX RATIO, POWER, SOFTENING.
